welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Carnot-Moon, where small-town charm meets big-city opportunities. Known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pittsburgh International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside Terminal
terminals.description: The airside terminal at Pittsburgh International Airport is connected to the main terminal by an underground people mover system.

terminals.name: Midfield Terminal
terminals.description: The midfield terminal at Pittsburgh International Airport serves low-cost carriers and is connected to the main terminal by a tram system.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Allegheny County Airport handles all commercial flights and includes various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Allegheny County Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering luxurious facilities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beaver Falls Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Beaver Falls Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at County Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at County Airport handles all air freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Butler County - Kenny Scholter Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
